de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.compound
Class GridLayout

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.AbstractShape
      de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.compound.AbstractLayout
          de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.compound.GridLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
Adjustable, Paintable, Shape
public class GridLayout
extends AbstractLayout
implements Adjustable

A grid layout organizes multiple "column layouts" to a two dimensional grid.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

adjust

public void adjust(Graphics2D graphic)
Description copied from interface: Adjustable
Recalculates the dimension and position of the implementor. Compound adjustable which contains other adjustable may need to invoke this method recursively.

Specified by:
adjust in interface Adjustable
Parameters:
graphic - Graphic context used for font measuring.
